brainly_data.question:
Flowering plants are ______.
a. gymnosperms
c. angiosperms
b. laurasians
d. archaeopteryx
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question:
Flowering plants are ______.
a. gymnosperms
c. angiosperms
b. laurasians
d. archaeopteryx
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The correct answer is c. angiosperms. These are plants that have flowers and pollen and they have to become fertile and reproduce sexually. Unlike them the gymnosperms just open their cones and drop the seeds on the ground and the plants either start growing out of it or no. The flower eventually turns into a fruit and we can then eat the fruit.
